answers.answer: Im not familiar with prozac but im on zoloft and it has gave me my life back.It did have a few side effects in the beginning and i didnt like it but so glad i stuck wiyh it cus i wudnt b were im at now,i was literally goin nuts with my anxiety and didnt think ne thing was gonna help me but this has done wonders for me.U can also ask ur dr for an anti-anxiety med to help wit the side effects if u want but they really arent that bad and go away after about a week.To me its a pretty safe med and helps with anxiety alot....wat ive been told its better then prozac for anxiety but then again everyones different jus dont let urself suffer like i did cuz i was so scared to try the med cuz u will feel so much better with the rite treatment of meds.Good Luck !!!!!! : )
I have been taking Zoloft for yrs.I am willing to talk with you anytime if you would like.:)
Thank you, I'm just so undecided about what to do!! My doctor actually prescribed me Prozac...
You can get diabetes, ulcers and hearth problems from stress elevated cortisol levels, so going untreated has its risks as well.
I know, i'm going in to see my regular doc today!!
I just don't know what would be the right meds for me to take. I'm just so terrified of the side effects but then again everything we take has side effects!!
A doctor told me no med can have an effect without a side effect. Look at a Motrin label's side effecs and many who take it would hesitate.

question: I need everyone's opinions on Prozac and Zoloft. My doctor said said Prozac could give me seizures...scared the s*** out of me!! Please let me know if you have taken either of these?
title: Prozac and Zoloft
